A giant bat is a larger version of a bat. They may be substituted for bats, which are given out as Slayer assignments mostly by Mazchna. They previously used magic as their primary method of attack, but now exclusively fight using melee. Their attacks don't hit particularly hard. Even low-levelled players are unlikely to need food when killing them. They always drop bat bones and have a chance of dropping a piece of batwing. They stop becoming aggressive at combat level 29.

There are also non-attackable giant bats in the Brimhaven Agility Arena and the Underground Pass.

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 7 August 2017 (Update):
    • Some bats that were only visible on members' worlds are now visible on free worlds.
  • patch 7 March 2016 (Update):
    • Giant bats have had their combat stats rebalanced (level 44 variant).
  • patch 22 November 2012 (Update):
    • Giant Bats once again drop the Giant bat wing for Rag and Bone Man.
  • update 27 February 2002 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The giant bats in the Brine Rat Cavern are the same size as regular bats.
